mapper.select: SELECT * FROM appointment ORDER BY aidx DESC
mapper.insert: insert into appointment (appointmentSubject, doctorInCharge, appointmentDate, appointmentTime, patientName, pidx, didx, patientPhone, patientId) values (#{appointmentSubject}, #{doctorInCharge}, #{appointmentDate}, #{appointmentTime}, #{patientName}, #{pidx}, #{didx}, #{patientPhone}, #{patientId})
